poem.title: General Winter
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Check / change down / exit / slow ice under snow. Sliproad slide and the steering bridles. Fresh fall drift you have to dig to find out what you used to know Just the hush the scurf of corky trees collapsing crystals like collapsing trees Snows like coalbeds consolidate there's a road here somewhere I'll find it.
